metadata.name: AWS_Root_User_Has_Successfully_Logged
metadata.author: Deloitte
metadata.description: This rule detects successfully admin logging

ruleText:
rule AWS_Root_User_Has_Successfully_Logged
{

  meta:
    name = "AWS_Root_User_Has_Successfully_Logged"
    author = "Deloitte"
    description = "This rule detects successfully admin logging"
    severity = "Medium"
    mitre_ttp = ""
    mitre_mitigation = ""

  events:
    $e.metadata.vendor_name = "AMAZON"
    $e.metadata.product_name = "AWS CloudTrail"
    $e.metadata.product_name = "admin" nocase  or $e.target.application = "Admin" nocase
    $e.metadata.product_name = "root" nocase or $e.target.application = "Root" nocase
    $e.security_result.action = "FAIL" or $e.security_result.action = "BLOCK"


  condition:
    $e
}
